properties.entry: INSERT INTO sc_product_cost ( TYPE, PURCHASE_COST, ASIN, SKU, BEFORE_LOGISTICS_COST, TARIFF, AMAZON_FEE, VARIABLE_CLOSURE_COST, OORDER_PROCESSING_FEE, USPS_COST, TAG_COST, PACKAGE_COST, STABLE_COST, WAREHOURSE_COST, LOST_FEE, LABOR_COST, SERVICE_COST, OTHER_COST, TOTAL_COST, SALE_PRICE, PROFIT_NUM, PROFIT_MARGINS, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( '{@#TYPE#}', '{@#PURCHASE_COST#}', '{@#ASIN#}', '{@#SKU#}', '{@#BEFORE_LOGISTICS_COST#}', '{@#TARIFF#}', '{@#AMAZON_FEE#}', '{@#VARIABLE_CLOSURE_COST#}', '{@#OORDER_PROCESSING_FEE#}', '{@#USPS_COST#}', '{@#TAG_COST#}', '{@#PACKAGE_COST#}', '{@#STABLE_COST#}', '{@#WAREHOURSE_COST#}', '{@#LOST_FEE#}', '{@#LABOR_COST#}', '{@#SERVICE_COST#}', '{@#OTHER_COST#}', '{@#TOTAL_COST#}', '{@#SALE_PRICE#}', '{@#PROFIT_NUM#}', '{@#PROFIT_MARGINS#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW() )

SELECT DISTINCT sc_product.*,sc_product_flow_details.DAY_PAGEVIEWS, sc_sale_competition.FM_NUM,sc_sale_competition.NM_NUM,sc_sale_competition.UM_NUM, sc_sale_fba.FBA_NUM,sc_sale_competition.TARGET_PRICE, sc_sale_potential.REVIEWS_NUM,sc_sale_potential.QUALITY_POINTS, (SELECT spi.local_url FROM sc_product_imgs spi WHERE spi.asin = sc_product.asin LIMIT 0,1 ) AS LOCAL_URL FROM sc_product LEFT JOIN sc_sale_competition ON sc_sale_competition.asin = sc_product.asin LEFT JOIN sc_sale_fba ON sc_sale_fba.asin = sc_product.asin LEFT JOIN sc_sale_potential ON sc_sale_potential.asin = sc_product.asin LEFT JOIN sc_product_flow_details ON sc_product_flow_details.asin = sc_product.asin where 1=1 {@ and sc_product.title like '%#title#%'} {@ and sc_product.asin = '#asin#'} {@ and sc_product.asin in ( select sc_product_filter_details.asin from sc_product_filter_details where sc_product_filter_details.status in (5,7) ) and 1=#unAsin# }
